source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures a serene street scene in a traditional Japanese neighborhood, featuring wooden buildings and lush greenery. The architecture reflects a blend of historical and modern elements, with a clear blue sky overhead. The setting is peaceful and picturesque.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: The video captures a serene street scene in a traditional Japanese neighborhood, featuring wooden buildings and lush greenery. The architecture reflects a blend of historical and modern elements, with a clear blue sky overhead. A person on an electric scooter, delivering food, enters the frame, adding a touch of modern urban life to the peaceful and picturesque setting.

The architecture reflects a blend of historical and modern elements, with a clear blue sky overhead. A person on an electric scooter, delivering food, enters the frame, adding a touch of modern urban life to the peaceful and picturesque setting.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a wide coastal boardwalk lined with palm trees, passing by several modern glass skyscrapers. As they move in a single file, one cyclist signals and turns off onto a side path, while the others continue straight. In the background, a large cruise ship slowly departs from the harbor, visible beyond the railing.
